overview:
Steve Brazell is a ideator and strategist. He helps businesses and individuals make more money by discovering, developing, and communicating their unique differences.

Steve Brazell is the founder of Hitman, Inc., a competition removal firm, and the author of “Clear! The simple guide to keeping your business alive and kicking.” He is also the developer of the worlds’ first Personal Branding Engine - BrandOpâ„¢ (www.mybrandop.com).

Steve lives in New York City.
